column3: “Ho...ly...Fuck. This is the shit. I didn't have to smoke too much, to get high as hell. The high was glorious too. Def pick up some Doritos and have a day”

“Holy shit. I ripped one bowl out of a bong and all I can say is what the fuck. I was just sitting there watching tv and all the sudden a purple llama emerged from my tv. He came to my bedside and introduced himself to me. He wasn’t like the other llamas he was kind and gentle. Next thing I know after one thing led to another I was on his back and we were galloping through the red wood forest. We were headed for battl...”
